titles.title: He Is The Fairest Of Ten Thousand, O Yes

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He is the fairest of ten thousand, O yes.
He is the fairest of ten thousand, O yes.
He is the fairest of ten thousand, and I love Him so.
I love Him so; I love Him so; I love Him so.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He is the Rose of Sharon, O yes.
He is the Rose of Sharon, O yes.
He is the Rose of Sharon, and I love Him so.
I love Him so; I love Him so; I love Him so.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He is the Lily of the Valley, O yes.
He is the Lily of the Valley, O yes.
He is the Lily of the Valley, and I love Him so.
I love Him so; I love Him so; I love Him so.
